Pre-Game Insights: England kicks off the tournament as the defending champion and the favourites with a stacked squad of quality players.
Scotland has been one of the most exciting associate teams in the world and made consistent improvements over the years.
Miscellaneous Highlights: England will take on Scotland to kick off their T20 World Cup 2024 campaign in Bridgetown.
The Scots played a couple of warm-up games of which one was washed out and the other resulted in a defeat.
England playing a tough series against the West Indies and then dominating Pakistan at home.
Scotland finished second in the tri-series against the Netherlands and Ireland.
Others: England boasts of one of the best batting lineups in the world led by captain Jos Buttler, who has found form at the right with aggressive batters around him.
Jofra Archerâ€™s return has given the side a massive boost.
Scotland batting, Southpaw George Munsey will be the lynchpin of their lineup with an aggressive style and incredible ability to score quickly against spin.
Mark Watt, the left-arm spinner, will be crucial with his change of pace and a trademark 24-yard ball.
